wikitext.*:
'''Geraint'''  of [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cornwall West Wales] was one of the companions of [[Ælfwine]] on his journey to [[Tol Eressëa]].<ref>{{SD|70}}, p. 279</ref>

== Etymology ==
The name ''Geraint'' is in [[Welsh]]. It might be derived from the Latinized Greek ''Gerontius'' ("old man").<ref>{{webcite|website=Wiktionary|articlename=Geraint|articleurl=http://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/Geraint}}</ref>
